column2: Descedant of Cacame Awemedinade, who was a great orca king whose hatred of turtles was so great that he wiped out several turtle kingdoms in revenge for his wife. Cacame became the hero of many legends of the orcas and is still cited as an example of what an orca king should be like.

Descedant of Gorthauron Tar-Mairon, who was a great emperor of Manatee Empire that united both manatees and turtles under his strict but fair rule. Proclaimed as fearsome "Dark Lord", Gorthauron Tar-Mairon greatly expanded the borders of the Manatee Empire by conquering the bordering realms of the sea.

Descendant of Celebrinquar, leader of the rebellion against rule of Overlord Gorthauron. Having managed to unite the rebellious manatee warlords and the subjugated noble houses of the turtles under his rule, Celebrinquar overthrew Gorthauron and proclaimed himself the Bright Lord.
A child from this bloodline may be born as a turtle
The Bright Ring considers the members of this bloodline as it's true masters
The Dark Ring considers the members of this bloodline as it's true masters
